## Scene.isResumedSession() method

Check if current session is a new session or a resumed session

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isResumedSession(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`boolean`

Usage:

```javascript
const isResumedSession = scene.isResumedSession();
```
